participant_1.background:
I want to live in a place with a better climate for my skin.
I made many memories with my family last year.
i love dragons.
we have two dogs small dogs.
my father used to be an insurance salesman.

participant_2.background:
I love the fact that my job allows me to travel and meet new people.
I love playing guitar but sometimes I spend too much time practicing and not enough time with my family.
I'm a fast driver in my red car.
I love listening to music while I work in my flower shop, it helps me get in the zone.
i am a grandparent at 44.

content.text: Hi, how are you?
I'm great! I love my job, I get to travel and meet new people. It's really rewarding.
Wow, that sounds really cool! I've never traveled much.
You should! It's a great way to learn about different cultures and meet new people.
Yeah, I would love to. Maybe I'll look into it.
I would definitely recommend it.
What do you like to do in your free time?
I love playing guitar. It's a great way to relax and de-stress.
That's awesome! I've always wanted to learn how to play the guitar.
You should! It's not too hard to learn.
Yeah, I think I will.
Cool, let me know if you need any help getting started.
Thanks! I will.
What are your hobbies?
I love spending time with my family and dogs. We go on a lot of hikes and adventures together.
That sounds really nice. I love spending time with my family too. I'm a grandparent at 44, so I get to spoil my grandkids a lot.
Wow, that's awesome! I'm sure your grandkids love you.
They do, a lot.
What do you like to do for work?
I own a flower shop. I love working with flowers and helping people find the perfect flowers for their special occasions.
That sounds really cool! I've always loved flowers.
Thanks! I'm glad I can help people bring a little bit of beauty into their lives.
Yeah, you're doing a great job.
Thanks
